content.connection: This website is using well designed Spotify OAuth2 access account which allow the website to access your data safely. There is no data stored in any server so you are totally safe when browsing or exiting the website without signing out.
content.creator3: as a side project during my studies. I hope you will find it useful ! If you find any bug or you want new functionalities do not hesitate to
content.description: Horus is a small web project that aims to provide new functionalities when manipulating Spotify playlists. Right now, it is not possible to create sub-playlists on Spotify filtering by track genres or artists. Moreover, indie artists are not really promoted on the platform so Horus try to highlight their work.
content.process: Horus is using the really open Spotify API to gather genres and data about artists, genre and tracks of your playlists. Once done, the app tries to provide a nice interface for you to filter and create new playlists from previous ones easily.

login.header: Explore, duplicate, split and share your Spotify playlists easily with Horus

delete.confirm-message: Do you really want to delete this playlist from your library ?

duplicate.button: Create new playlist with following tracks ⏭️

playlist.fully-loaded: All artists, tracks and genres have been retrieved
playlist.header: Start browsing your playlists to gather some useful data on them, split them by genre and so much more
playlist.load-more-warning: Your playlist has more than {limit} tracks, do you want to load all of them ?
playlist.no-tracks: This playlist doesn't have any track now. Open the playlist on Spotify and try to add tracks to start seeing them here

your-music.description: Spotify playlist with all your favorite songs
your-music.name: Your music
